title: ‘Sexy Coffee’ café set to open next to Glasgow Central Station this weekend
description: The ‘new-look’ coffee concept next to Glasgow Central will offer cocktails, coffee, and café food from 7am until midnight when it opens this Sunday, September 17

author: WAM
title: World of Coffee Dubai 2024 highlights promising prospects for development and expansion of coffee industry in UAE
description: DXB Live, the integrated event management and experiential agency of the Dubai World Trade Centre, continues the preparations for the 3rd edition of the World of Coffee exhibition, which will be held from 21st to 23rd January 2024.With expectations that the coffee market in the UAE will grow at an annual rate of 8.4 per cent between 2023 and 2029, and by about 7.5 per cent annually in the Middle East and Africa between 2022 and 2027, the exhibition is witnessing a wide regional and global interest from industry leaders, experts and specialists.As per a report by Statista, coffee markets in...

author: BusinessWorld
title: Coffee firms won’t be ready to comply with EU deforestation law – report
description: LONDON – Most global coffee firms will not be ready to comply with the European Union’s new law preventing imports of commodities linked to deforestation, and small farmers may suffer as a consequence, a major coffee sector report has found. The EU’s landmark law, which comes into effect at end-2024, requires importers of commodities like […]

title: Kelowna RCMP Coffee with a Cop returns this week (Kelowna)

title: I ordered a large coffee and a condo. I got both.
